articles.title: Deadly civilian plane crashes in India over the decades
articles.description: NEW DELHI, India: An Air India plane bound for London with 242 people on board crashed minutes after taking off from India’s western city of Ahmedabad on Thursday, the airline and police said, and India’s federal health minister said that “many people” were killed. Following are details of some other airline accidents in India in recent years: AUGUST 2020 Twenty-one people

articles.description: Ahmedabad plane crash live: An Air India flight carrying 242 passengers crashed near Ahmedabad Airport. As per sources, at least 120 people are feared dead. London-bound Flight AI 171 crashed moments after taking off from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport.
